result.markdown: --- title: "ENVS 601 Lecture" description: | A short description of the post. author: - name: Rodney Dyer url: https://dyerlab.org affiliation: Center for Environmental Studies affiliation_url: https://ces.vcu.edu orcid_id: 0000-0003-4707-3453 date: 2017-10-23 output: distill::distill_article: self_contained: false --- Here are my slides from a guest lecture I gave in ENVS 601. Interesting class, only place I've been called totally ignorant by another instructor… I'm thinking it was a compliment aimed at bias-free research approaches.
